solution_line_template: The florist can make {narcissus_flowers}/{flowers_per_bouquet} = <<{narcissus_flowers}/{flowers_per_bouquet}={bouquets_narcissus}>>{bouquets_narcissus} bouquets of narcissus.
The florist can make {chrysanthemums_flowers}/{flowers_per_bouquet} = <<{chrysanthemums_flowers}/{flowers_per_bouquet}={bouquets_chrysanthemums}>>{bouquets_chrysanthemums} bouquets of chrysanthemums.
The florist can make {bouquets_narcissus} +{bouquets_chrysanthemums} = <<{bouquets_narcissus}+{bouquets_chrysanthemums}={total_bouquets}>>{total_bouquets} bouquets in total.
